descriptionHtml:
[size=15][b][center]Steam Breath[/size][/b][/center]

[size=5][b]Description[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]
- This Add Steam Breath / shout to skyrim And an amulet of time .
- The first word is Steam 
- The Second Freezes the enemy
- The Third burns the enemy
[/size][/b]

[size=5][b]added Spells and items[/b][/size]
[size=3][b]

 Shout:
- Steam breath 

 Word of Power:
- Rost Intimidate
- Bol Exhausted
- Zorah Shattered

Items:
- Amulet Of Time
[/size][/b]

[size=4][b]
 Well i Dunno how to put them in stone so just type the code :/.
 if you can teach me How to put it on stones that would be great :)

 Just type \'help steam 4\' and so on :)
 Codes of my spells should ended in:

 List:

Shout:
Steam Breath - xxxD62
 
Word of power:
 Rost/Intimidate - xxxd6e
 Bol/Exhausted -xxxd6f
 Zorah/Shattered - xxxd70
[/size][/b]

[size=4][b][center] I Recommend you to download:[/size][/b][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4291714]Spacewiking[/url]
-[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19212]Dwemer Exoskeleton[/url]

author: Abram1
